item.title: Feed back please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:12, topic:479190”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=597421.msg4206621#msg4206621 date=1359005458]

Had a look around the site too, it’s really good, well done if this is all yours, validated to html5 too, that’s what I like to see

No it’s not. Click the link for the html 5 validator:
http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http%3A%2F%2Frune-planet.com
Edit: otherwise, it does look neat. Good work

Fixed

Good job.
[/quote]
Quit acting like you know what your talking about please[/quote]
I’m not. I was saying good job legitimately. Can I not saying it without you giving some snide ass attitude, when it wasn’t even directed towards you? Whether or not I know how to do what he has done, it IS good work and he did do a GOOD JOB. You moron.

Read full topic

item.title: Feed back please
item.dc:creator: @Server_Sniffer Server Sniffer
item.description:
@Server_Sniffer wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:5, topic:479190”]Woah, you know you don’t have to select every single element by hierarchy right?

So this:

div#page div#body div#content div#forum div.content div.footer ul.paging li.last a

Becomes this:

div.footer ul.paging li.last a

Also look into html resets in css, would save you a fair few lines.

Had a look around the site too, it’s really good, well done if this is all yours, validated to html5 too, that’s what I like to see[/quote]

I now have Ruby on my team for the PHP

Read full topic

item.title: Feed back please
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Woah, you know you don’t have to select every single element by hierarchy right?

So this:

div#page div#body div#content div#forum div.content div.footer ul.paging li.last a

Becomes this:

div.footer ul.paging li.last a

Also look into html resets in css, would save you a fair few lines.

Had a look around the site too, it’s really good, well done if this is all yours, validated to html5 too, that’s what I like to see

Read full topic
